title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.23 - Allowable costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.23 - Allowable costs

State Regulations

Documented costs which are necessary for the day-to-day
operation of a provider, are directly or indirectly related to patient care, and are not expressly declared nonallowable by Federal or State
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
